A clan that is clan level 7 or above may use 10,000 reputation points to create Knight units.
Up to 4 Knights units may be created in this way. At the time of creation, 10 clan members may be accepted per Knight unit.
Clans at level 9 may use a reputation score of 5,000 to increase the Order of Knights.
Each Knight unit created must appoint one direct clan member as a Knight Commander. The social rank of the appointed clan commander will be accordingly raised.

기사단 창설.
Reinforce Knights. [not done]
기사단명칭 변경.
기사단장 변경.
